message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe is worth a significant amount to the right person.  While I can't disclose the exact details just yet, I'm confident you'll find it valuable.  I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. This is a price I'm confident will provide you with a strong return on investment.  Let me know if you're interested in discussing this further.
